mapper.sql: id, mFrom, mTo, linKMan, phoneNum, remark, content, createDate, isLink, linkResult
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tbl_online_order ( mFrom, mTo, linKMan, phoneNum, remark, content, createDate, isLink, linkResult ) VALUES ( #{mfrom}, #{mto}, #{linKman}, #{phoneNum}, #{remark}, #{content}, #{createDate}, #{isLink}, #{linkResult} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE tbl_online_order
mFrom = #{mfrom},
mTo = #{mto},
linKMan = #{linKman},
phoneNum = #{phoneNum},
remark = #{remark},
content = #{content},
createDate = #{createDate},
isLink = #{isLink},
linkResult = #{linkResult},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE tbl_online_order
mFrom = #{map.mfrom},
mTo = #{map.mto},
linKMan = #{map.linKman},
phoneNum = #{map.phoneNum},
remark = #{map.remark},
content = #{map.content},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
isLink = #{map.isLink},
linkResult = #{map.linkResult},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_online_order ( mFrom, mTo, linKMan, phoneNum, remark, content, createDate, isLink, linkResult ) VALUES ( #{map.mfrom}, #{map.mto}, #{map.linKman}, #{map.phoneNum}, #{map.remark}, #{map.content}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.isLink}, #{map.linkResult} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tbl_online_order
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND mFrom like CONCAT('%', #{mfrom} , '%')
AND mTo like CONCAT('%', #{mto} , '%')
AND linKMan like CONCAT('%', #{linKman} , '%')
AND phoneNum like CONCAT('%', #{phoneNum} , '%')
AND remark like CONCAT('%', #{remark} , '%')
AND content like CONCAT('%', #{content} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND isLink like CONCAT('%', #{isLink} , '%')
AND linkResult like CONCAT('%', #{linkResult} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
